mapper.select: select nvl(point, 0) point, nvl(coin, 0) coin from point_coin where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into compensation values (#{id}, sysdate + (INTERVAL '9' HOUR), 1, #{event}, #{inc}, 0)
insert into compensation values (#{id}, sysdate + (INTERVAL '9' HOUR), 2, #{event}, 0, 1)
mapper.select: select count(dates) from (select distinct to_char(dates, 'yy/mm/dd') dates from compensation where event = 1 and type = 1 and id = #{value} and to_char(dates, 'yy/mm/dd') between to_char(sysdate + (INTERVAL '9' HOUR) - to_char(sysdate + (INTERVAL '9' HOUR), 'D') +2, 'yy/mm/dd') and to_char(sysdate + (INTERVAL '9' HOUR) - to_char(sysdate + (INTERVAL '9' HOUR), 'D') + 7, 'yy/mm/dd'))

select e.name, r.id, r.record, RANK() OVER (order by r.record desc ) as rk from exercise e, record r where e.no = r.ex_no and
no = #{no}
no in (6, 7)
no = #{no} + 1
and
to_char(r.dates, 'yy/mm/dd') between to_char(sysdate+ (INTERVAL '9' HOUR) - to_char(sysdate+ (INTERVAL '9' HOUR), 'D') -2, 'yy/mm/dd') and to_char(sysdate+ (INTERVAL '9' HOUR) - to_char(sysdate+ (INTERVAL '9' HOUR), 'D') + 4, 'yy/mm/dd')
to_char(r.dates, 'yy/mm/dd') between to_char(sysdate+ (INTERVAL '9' HOUR) - to_char(sysdate+ (INTERVAL '9' HOUR), 'D') +5, 'yy/mm/dd') and to_char(sysdate+ (INTERVAL '9' HOUR) - to_char(sysdate+ (INTERVAL '9' HOUR), 'D') + 11, 'yy/mm/dd')
order by r.dates

select
to_char(sysdate + (INTERVAL '9' HOUR) - to_char(sysdate + (INTERVAL '9' HOUR), 'D') -2, 'yy/mm/dd') sdate ,to_char(sysdate + (INTERVAL '9' HOUR) - to_char(sysdate + (INTERVAL '9' HOUR), 'D') + 4, 'yy/mm/dd') edate
to_char(sysdate + (INTERVAL '9' HOUR) - to_char(sysdate+ (INTERVAL '9' HOUR), 'D') +5, 'yy/mm/dd') sdate ,to_char(sysdate+ (INTERVAL '9' HOUR) - to_char(sysdate+ (INTERVAL '9' HOUR), 'D') + 11, 'yy/mm/dd') edate
from dual
